sentences.sContent: A lot of teachers expect the situation to worsen over the next few years.
sentences.sCn: 许多老师认为接下来的几年情形会更糟。

sentences.sContent: Interfering now could worsen the problem.
sentences.sCn: 目前介入可能会使问题更严重。

words.tran: 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级）
更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地
恶化（worsen的ing形式）；使变得更坏

trans.tranOther: to become worse or make something worse
